attributes.action: SCRAP proposed plans to tax home improvements such as conservatories, loft conversions etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hardworking homeowners have enough to pay for with increasing house prices, household bills and council taxes without a totally unacceptable intrusion of officials forcing homeowners to let them into their houses to assess improvements and tax them. An Englishmans home is his castle, hmm this reminds me of the old window tax! Stand up for your right to live undisturbed in your own home people. Join the petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
